synopsis.text:
Being a descendant of nobility, Angie, a 12-year-old girl residing in 19th century London, possesses an extraordinary intellect and unwavering courage that surpasses many adults. After successfully thwarting a plot to steal the Queen's jewels, she is entrusted by the Queen herself to tackle the most challenging cases.

Collaborating with Detective Michael of Scotland Yard and a group of children, Angie embarks on a series of thrilling investigations, employing her exceptional wit to unravel one mystery after another. The animated series captures Angie's adventures, brimming with excitement, suspense, and emotional depth as she navigates the complex world of crime-solving.

With a penchant for uncovering the truth, Angie fearlessly dives into every enigmatic situation, often joining forces with the somewhat ineffective police chief, his dashing assistant Michael, and her loyal friend Franck. Together, they apprehend countless criminals and bring justice to the streets of London.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
